name: react4xp-mono
description: React4xp monorepo for all NPM dependencies

scripts._TEMP_DISABLED_version: npm run test && lerna version --conventional-commits --exact && lerna run postversion && echo "Versioning done, using conventional commits. Publish to NPM with: 'gradlew doPublish'."
scripts.setup: npm i run-script-os rimraf && npm run npmInstall
scripts.npmLink: npm run npmLink:buildcomponents && npm run npmLink:client && npm run npmLink:constants && npm run npmLink:externals && npm run npmLink:nashornpolyfills && npm run npmLink:regions && npm run npmLink:react4xp && npm run npmLink:finalize
scripts.npmLink:buildcomponents: cd packages/buildcomponents && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link react4xp-build-components && rimraf packages/buildcomponents/node_modules
scripts.npmLink:client: cd packages/client && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link react4xp-runtime-client && rimraf packages/client/node_modules
scripts.npmLink:constants: cd packages/constants && npx babel src/bin -d bin && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link react4xp-buildconstants && rimraf packages/constants/node_modules
scripts.npmLink:externals: cd packages/externals && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link react4xp-runtime-externals && rimraf packages/externals/node_modules
scripts.npmLink:nashornpolyfills: cd packages/nashornpolyfills && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link react4xp-runtime-nashornpolyfills && rimraf packages/nashornpolyfills/node_modules
scripts.npmLink:regions: cd packages/regions && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link react4xp-regions && rimraf packages/regions/node_modules
scripts.npmLink:react4xp: cd packages/react4xp && npm link && cd ../.. && npm link react4xp && rimraf packages/react4xp/node_modules
scripts.npmLink:finalize: node_modules/.bin/symlink-dir node_modules packages/buildcomponents/node_modules && node_modules/.bin/symlink-dir node_modules packages/client/node_modules && node_modules/.bin/symlink-dir node_modules packages/constants/node_modules && node_modules/.bin/symlink-dir node_modules packages/externals/node_modules && node_modules/.bin/symlink-dir node_modules packages/nashornpolyfills/node_modules && node_modules/.bin/symlink-dir node_modules packages/regions/node_modules && node_modules/.bin/symlink-dir node_modules packages/react4xp/node_modules
scripts.npmUnlink: (rimraf node_modules/react4xp-build-components && rimraf packages/buildcomponents/node_modules && rimraf node_modules/react4xp-runtime-client && rimraf packages/client/node_modules && rimraf node_modules/react4xp-buildconstants && rimraf packages/constants/node_modules && rimraf node_modules/react4xp-runtime-externals && rimraf packages/externals/node_modules && rimraf node_modules/react4xp-runtime-nashornpolyfills && rimraf packages/nashornpolyfills/node_modules && rimraf node_modules/react4xp-regions && rimraf packages/regions/node_modules && rimraf node_modules/react4xp && rimraf packages/react4xp/node_modules) || exit 0
scripts.npmUpdate: rimraf node_modules && npm i && npm update && npm update --dev && npm audit fix && npm run npmUpdate:sub && npm run npmInstall
scripts.npmUpdate:sub: npm run npmUpdate:buildcomponents && npm run npmUpdate:client && npm run npmUpdate:constants && npm run npmUpdate:externals && npm run npmUpdate:nashornpolyfills && npm run npmUpdate:regions && npm run npmUpdate:react4xp
scripts.npmUpdate:buildcomponents: rimraf packages/buildcomponents/node_modules && cd packages/buildcomponents && npm update && npm update --dev && npm audit fix && cd ../.. && rimraf packages/buildcomponents/node_modules
scripts.npmUpdate:client: rimraf packages/client/node_modules && cd packages/client && npm update && npm update --dev && npm audit fix && cd ../.. && rimraf packages/client/node_modules
scripts.npmUpdate:constants: rimraf packages/constants/node_modules && cd packages/constants && npm update && npm update --dev && npm audit fix && cd ../.. && rimraf packages/constants/node_modules
scripts.npmUpdate:externals: rimraf packages/externals/node_modules && cd packages/externals && npm update && npm update --dev && npm audit fix && cd ../.. && rimraf packages/externals/node_modules
scripts.npmUpdate:nashornpolyfills: rimraf packages/nashornpolyfills/node_modules && cd packages/nashornpolyfills && npm update && npm update --dev && npm audit fix && cd ../.. && rimraf packages/nashornpolyfills/node_modules
scripts.npmUpdate:regions: rimraf packages/regions/node_modules && cd packages/regions && npm update && npm update --dev && npm audit fix && cd ../.. && rimraf packages/regions/node_modules
scripts.npmUpdate:react4xp: rimraf packages/react4xp/node_modules && cd packages/react4xp && npm update && npm update --dev && npm audit fix && cd ../.. && rimraf packages/react4xp/node_modules

author: Espen Norderud
